summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York daily activity report for July 23, 2019. It documents that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was placed on suicide watch and notes various operational issues, staffing shortages, and inmate population statistics.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054 and placed on suicide watch on July 23, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

persons.name: Burnett
persons.context: Inmate #76254-054 noted as being at an outside hospital with USMS guards.

persons.name: Cooper
persons.context: Inmate #85972-054 who was both newly admitted to and released from MCC New York on the report date.

events.title: Epstein placed on suicide watch
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was placed on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was placed on suicide watch at MCC New York on July 23, 2019.
The report notes operational issues including an inoperative control panel for ES/GS Main Door/Fire Exit doors and an inoperative inner gate.
Staffing shortages are documented, affecting correctional assignments on 10-South and in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).
The total inmate population at the beginning of the morning watch shift on July 23, 2019, was 776.
The document is a routine daily activity report from the prison, created the day after the events it describes.
